entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
